name: NekoDice
description:
A software for vtubers (Live2D).
Built-in link system.
Supports iOS face capture (Use Shiori).
Built-in high performance face capture, let your model become more accurate.
Built-in Gift system supports Bilibili and AcFun(DLC).
Also supports more face params like ParamMouthU, ParamMouthTongue(ParamMouthT). More body params like ParamBodyX, ParamBodyY, ParamBodyZ.
